subject: Documentary Films and Programs
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The Don Imus meltdown can be illuminated by viewing “This Is a Game Ladies,” a 2004 documentary about the Rutgers University women’s basketball team.
snippet: The Don Imus meltdown can be illuminated by viewing “This Is a Game Ladies,” a 2004 documentary about the Rutgers University women’s basketball team.
